mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_NO, SHOPPER_NO, PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, SHIPPING_NAME, SHIPPING_ADDRESS, ORDER_DATE, MEDIA_DATA, DISCOUNT_PRICE, STOCK FROM ( SELECT rownum as rnum, PRODUCT_NO, ORDER_NO, SHOPPER_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, SHIPPING_NAME, SHIPPING_ADDRESS, ORDER_DATE, MEDIA_DATA, DISCOUNT_PRICE, STOCK FROM ( SELECT oh.ORDER_NO as ORDER_NO, oh.SHOPPER_NO as SHOPPER_NO, p.PRODUCT_NO as PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, SHIPPING_NAME, SHIPPING_ADDRESS, ORDER_DATE, MEDIA_DATA, p.DISCOUNT_PRICE as DISCOUNT_PRICE, STOCK FROM ORDER_HISTORY oh JOIN RECEIPT_HISTORY rh ON oh.ORDER_NO = rh.ORDER_NO JOIN SHIPPING_ADDRESS sa ON oh.ADDRESS_NO = sa.ADDRESS_NO JOIN SHOPPER s ON oh.SHOPPER_NO = s.SHOPPER_NO JOIN PRODUCT p ON rh.PRODUCT_NO = p.PRODUCT_NO JOIN PRODUCT_BOARD pb ON p.PRODUCT_NO = pb.PRODUCT_NO JOIN BOARD_MEDIA bm ON pb.BOARD_NO = bm.BOARD_NO WHERE oh.SHOPPER_NO = #{shopperNo} AND bm.MEDIA_NAME LIKE '%list_thumbnail%' ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC ) WHERE rownum <= #{endRowNo} ) where rnum >= #{startRowNo}

select p.product_no, order_date, product_name, product_option, price, stock, payment_price from order_history oh, receipt_history rh, product p where oh.order_no = rh.order_no and rh.product_no = p.product_no and shopper_no = #{shopper_no}

SELECT oh.ORDER_NO as ORDER_NO, oh.SHOPPER_NO as SHOPPER_NO, p.PRODUCT_NO as PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, SHIPPING_NAME, SHIPPING_ADDRESS, ORDER_DATE, MEDIA_DATA, p.DISCOUNT_PRICE as DISCOUNT_PRICE, STOCK FROM ORDER_HISTORY oh JOIN RECEIPT_HISTORY rh ON oh.ORDER_NO = rh.ORDER_NO JOIN SHIPPING_ADDRESS sa ON oh.ADDRESS_NO = sa.ADDRESS_NO JOIN SHOPPER s ON oh.SHOPPER_NO = s.SHOPPER_NO JOIN PRODUCT p ON rh.PRODUCT_NO = p.PRODUCT_NO JOIN PRODUCT_BOARD pb ON p.PRODUCT_NO = pb.PRODUCT_NO JOIN BOARD_MEDIA bm ON pb.BOARD_NO = bm.BOARD_NO WHERE oh.SHOPPER_NO = #{shopperNo} AND p.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' AND MEDIA_NAME LIKE '%list_thumbnail%' ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC
